Message:
After wandering and
searching for Queen Amleth,
I arrived at an altar that was
abloom with crimson crystals.

As my mind drifts in
and out of reality,
I wait, longing to see her.

It will be fine.
I have faith that she will come.

Focusing on Her Majesty
keeps my mind from shattering
into a thousand pieces.

Queen Amleth.
It was my dream...
to be by your side.

Even if this sword would
one day command me
to end your life...
I did not stop dreaming.

Ahh... If only I was more
honest about my feelings...
If only I had spoken
with you more...

Only now do I realize
the many things I have
always wanted to say to you.

How I loved the tea we would
drink more than anything else.

How I was secretly captivated
by the sight of you absorbed
in your books.

How I have cherished you
since the very beginning...

As my mind fades into darkness,
my memories of her begin
to melt away until but
one thought remains—
“I wish you were here...”

the shatter of a crystal fills the air,
followed by the sound of someone
ascending the altar’s steps...
I knew those footsteps all too well.
Ahh... You came for me after all...
